document.full_text: britain is to add "bunker-busting" bombs to the arsenal its warplanes are using over libya, a weapon it said on sunday would send a loud message to muammar gaddafi that it is time to quit.
document.title: britain readies "bunker-busting" bombs for libya
lines_and_colors: britain is to add "bunker-busting" bombs to the arsenal its warplanes are using over libya, a weapon it said on sunday would send a loud message to muammar gaddafi that it is time to quit.
